pr_title: Handle SocketTimeoutExceptions in LDAP and Proxy Disclosure Scan Rules

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure what issue this is addressing. Instead of sending originalmsg (which is actually the message passed into the scan method) should this simply leverage getBaseMsg() and not resend the msg being passed in?
timeline.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText: This was added to make sure that the message had a response (e.g. messages of temporary nodes). This is no longer needed as core ensures that the messages have a response.
replies.author: thc202

replies.bodyText: And to answer your question, yes, it can use the base message.
replies.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: Should it return? If there's no response there's nothing to check?
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.message:
Handle SocketTimeoutExceptions in LDAP and Proxy Disclosure Scan Rules

- Addressed STEs encountered in specific locations in these two scan

- Added Fix note to the CHANGELOGs.
